class.name: NetworkInput
class.brief_description: Base class for networked input gathering and buffering.

method.name: _gather
method.description: Called before a tick is executed. Use this function to gather input data for the current frame. During a rollback, the buffered input will be used instead of calling this function.

method.name: is_input_authority
method.description: Returns true if the input can be used.

method.name: sample
method.description: Collect a sample for the property. The property final value will be the average of all samples collected.
